public static String parseHexStringToString(String hexString,
                                            String encoding)
                                     throws UnsupportedEncodingException
Parse a hex String to a normal String by converting every 2 hex values to one character using a given encoding.

Parameters:
hexString - String containing only hex values
encoding - The name of a supported character encoding.
Returns:
parsed hex String converted with the specified encoding
Throws:
UnsupportedEncodingException - if the named encoding is not supported

mergePropertyInfo

public static String[][] mergePropertyInfo(String[][] spi,
                                           String[][] tpi)
Returns a new nx2-matrix by merging the given nx2-matrices spi and tpi. The contents of the given matrices are just copied into a new matrix. No checks for double entries are performed. This method may be usefol for the handling of property infos in derivated classes of components (e. g. ConfigManagers).

Parameters:
spi - a nx2 matrix of strings
tpi - a nx2 matrix of strings
Returns:
a nx2 matrix containing all strings from spi and tpi
